text: 2|149|akave, (napiye!) Nir enkiruntu purappattalum (tolumpotu makkavilulla) â€˜masjitul haramin' pakkame umatu mukattait tiruppuviraka. Niccayamaka itutan umatu iraivanutaiya unmai(yana kattalai)yakum. (Akave, itaip parri vin tarkkam ceypavarkale!) Ninkal ceyvataipparri allah paramukamayillai
